flawed_nl_solution:
Sandy's fingernails will grow a total of ( 0.1 ) * 12 = <<(0.1)*12=1.2>>1.2 inches per year.
To achieve the world record, Sandy needs to grow her fingernails a total of 26 - 2 = <<26-2=42>>42 inches.
It will take her a total of 42 / 1.2 = <<42/1.2=35>>35 years.
Sandy will be 12 + 35 = <<12+35=47>>47 years old when she achieves the world record.
#### 46.99999999999999

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 42. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
